text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
meaning: Doubt and fear can hinder progress, so believe in yourself.

text: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt
meaning: Make the best of your current situation and resources.

text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius
meaning: Persistence is key to achieving your goals.

text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill
meaning: Both success and failure are temporary; perseverance matters most.

author: Aristotle
meaning: Your happiness is determined by your own actions and mindset.

text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky
meaning: If you don't try, you will never succeed.

text: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James
meaning: Your actions, no matter how small, have an impact.

text: Life isn’t about waiting for the storm to pass, it’s about learning to dance in the rain.
author: Vivian Greene
meaning: Embrace challenges and make the most out of difficult situations.

text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker
meaning: Your actions today shape your future.

text: Difficulties in life are intended to make us better, not bitter.
author: Dan Reeves
meaning: Hard times help us grow rather than bring us down.
